workflows.name: VSPipeline
workflows.description: Run VSPipeline to create projects and supporting tasks

workflows.name: Sentieon Secondary Analysis
workflows.description: Sentieon pipelines for both short-read (BWA-MEM) and long-read (minimap2) workflows with DNAscope and TNScope

workflows.name: PacBio Germline HiFi WGS
workflows.description: PacBio HiFi germline WGS pipeline based on the WDL workflow

workflows.name: PacBio Somatic WGS
workflows.description: PacBio HiFi somatic WGS pipeline based on the WDL workflow

workflows.name: PacBio PureTarget
workflows.description: PTCP pipeline for analyzing PacBio PureTarget carrier screening data

workflows.name: Secondary Analysis Utilities
workflows.description: Tasks for working with secondary analysis results and quality metrics. Includes compress and index functionality for VCF, BAM, CRAM, BED, and FASTQ files

workflows.name: Cohort Allele Frequency
workflows.description: Cohort population frequencies tracks computation from VCFs using gautil

workflows.name: BaseSpace Integration
workflows.description: Download tasks for Illumina BaseSpace for the Golden Helix Server

workflows.name: Archer Integration
workflows.description: Integration workflow and tasks for Archer Analysis Server for Golden Helix Server

workflows.name: DNAnexus Integration
workflows.description: Golden Helix server tasks for automating file uploads and downloads with DNAnexus

workflows.name: Azure Blob Storage Download
workflows.description: Bulk download and transfer capabilities for Azure Blob Storage

workflows.name: Amazon S3 Download
workflows.description: Bulk download and transfer capabilities for Amazon S3

workflows.name: Legacy VarSeq Cohort Project
workflows.description: Incrementally add small variants to a VarSeq project
